name: MTH-caesar-scan-v1.0
description: Scan all Caesar shifts 0–25 over A–Z (after upper_strip_v1.0 normalization).

name: MTH-vigenere-ic-scan-v1.0
description: Estimate likely Vigenère key lengths using index-of-coincidence, then rank. A–Z after normalization.

name: MTH-coltrans-3to12-v1.0
description: Columnar transposition with column count 3..12; try both read/write directions; keep top candidates.
